text: Today the Senate voted to adopt my amendment which will expand the popular 529 college savings plans so that parents can save for K-12 elementary and secondary school tuition, including educational expenses for homeschool students. -> http://bit.ly/2Alkygc http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/936830451791962112/pu/img/-WAbLeT9N4jHHVG9.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/936830451791962112/pu/vid/320x180/_HUKe5_eLkUaOnxx.mp4
RT @nytpolitics Latest from the Senate: Vice President Mike Pence provided a tie-breaking vote to pass an amendment on the tax bill offered by Senator Ted Cruz http://nyti.ms/2kg34vM

RT @cspan Seen on C-SPAN2: @VP Pence breaks 50-50 tie on @SenTedCruz Amendment on 529 Savings Plan Funds. He votes in the affirmative and the amendment is agreed to. http://cs.pn/2kckFVh #TaxReform http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DQBGeSDVwAI8GE5.jpg
Finance Committee Announces Improvements to Senate Tax Bill | Senator Rand Paul https://www.paul.senate.gov/finance-committee-announces-improvements-senate-tax-bill
The tax plan approved tonight by my Republican colleagues is shameful. This is a victory for corporations and the top 1% of Americans, not teachers, not seniors, and certainly not the middle class.

While I still would have preferred larger cuts, this bill provides a foundation on which to continue building. Today marks a victory for giving the American people back more of their own money and reforming an archaic tax code. https://www.paul.senate.gov/news/dr-rand-paul-applauds-senate-passage-tax-cuts-calls-further-action

Tonight the @SenateGOP gave a giant tax break to the rich & left everyone else holding the bag. This is about more than economics – it’s about our values. The Republicans just proved they are morally bankrupt. #GOPTaxScam
Working families are already on the ropes – and this #GOPTaxScam is another punch in the gut. We must keep fighting back with everything we’ve got to stop them from delivering the knockout blow.

This Congress doesn’t work for working families. It works for corporate lobbyists & campaign donors in backroom deals & 1:30 AM votes. This corruption is hollowing out America’s middle class & tearing down our democracy.

RT @SenateGOP Tax reform will double the standard deduction, double the child tax credit, and create nearly 1 million new jobs. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DQBQcCHXkAAlZLl.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/936735146425937920/vid/480x480/d9TcQq7hy1hZSVgD.mp4

What happened early this morning — voting on the GOP tax bill just mere hours after Senators received the final text — was irresponsible and downright disrespectful to the American people. What was in the bill was even worse. I voted NO.

RT @SenBooker I’m furious, but this fight is not over. 

In the days and weeks to come, I’ll do everything I possibly can to ensure this embarrassment of a tax bill never becomes law.

I’m furious, but this fight is not over. 

In the days and weeks to come, I’ll do everything I possibly can to ensure this embarrassment of a tax bill never becomes law.
.@CoryBooker Statement on Senate Passage of Disastrous Republican Tax Proposal: http://bit.ly/2iAfZYX
For the LORD gives wisdom, from his mouth come knowledge and understanding Proverbs 2:6
Excited about economic growth #TaxReform will create. But Senate missed the chance to make it so much better.I will never stop trying 4/4
Workers making between 20 & 50K would have benefited most from expanded #ChildTaxCredit a pay raise for millions of families 3/4
However we could have done so much more for workers if we had passed our plan to expand #ChildTaxCredit to help workers & families 2/4
America needs reforms that will BOTH grow economy & help workers.Last night U.S. Senate passed #TaxReform that will help grow economy 1/4
@USSenate Excited about what #TaxReform will do for economic growth.But it could have been an even better for more people.I will never stop trying 4/4
@USSenate Our plan would have really helped millions of workers making between 20 &50K. It would in effect have been a pay raise for them 3/4
@USSenate However, #TaxReform would have been so much better for workers if we had been able to pass our plan to expand the #ChildTaxCredit 2/2

The Senate also voted to adopt my amendment to expand 529 College Savings Plans to include K-12 elementary and secondary school tuition for public, private, and religious schools, including K-12 educational expenses for homeschool students. https://twitter.com/tedcruz/status/936940542478471168 QT @tedcruz Last night, the Senate joined together to provide historic tax relief, that serves as an investment in our nation and our economic well-being. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DQCuVDkXUAAAuaX.jpg
Last night, the Senate joined together to provide historic tax relief, that serves as an investment in our nation and our economic well-being. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DQCuVDkXUAAAuaX.jpg

RT @JeremyR1992 @CoryBooker Hold the GOP accountable. Remind them that Obama actually held substantive town halls before the ACA passage. https://www.c-span.org/video/?288323-1/presidential-town-hall-meeting-health-care

Kelly, I went to bed last night angry and sad. But never once have I stopped being grateful that I get to represent you and all of NJ. We must accept some defeats but never let ourselves be defeated. Thank you for giving me the honor to represent you and to fight on. https://twitter.com/kellymcall24/status/936951991166742529 QT @KellyMcAll24 @SenBooker @CoryBooker I'm proud to have you as one of my senators. Thank you.

New Jersey here ... coffee consumed, thoughts gathered and fight will continue. Thank you. https://twitter.com/ddeeb61/status/936952003628019712 QT @ddeeb61 @CoryBooker Texas here... drink some coffee, gather your thoughts and fight another day... thank you

You have my respect too. Thank you. And even if/when we disagree, may our mutual respect never cease. That is the foundation for a truly greater nation. https://twitter.com/carolinebha2/status/936952014122225665 QT @carolinebha2 @CoryBooker Thank you @CoryBooker for all you do and for speaking up. You have my respect.

Yes. This no goes to a conference to reconcile the differences between the House bill and the Senate bill. Then that final bill goes back to the Senate and House for a final vote. We must work to block it then. This isn’t over. The fight continues. https://twitter.com/baldydem/status/936952040550490112 QT @BaldyDem @CoryBooker Senator Booker - will you tweet the process?  That this is not yet law, etc.
I will never give up the fight. Thank you for the encouraging words. https://twitter.com/fingers0708/status/936946930843832320 QT @fingers0708 @CoryBooker @gingerliy1 Don’t stop fighting for NJ Cory!

I broke up with sleep last night and I’m dating coffee this morning. . . I appreciate her warmth and stimulating company. https://twitter.com/itsways/status/936947203750481922 QT @itsways @CoryBooker Doesn't look like you got much sleep, Senator.  Neither did I.  Very sad this morning.

RT @StyleWriterNYC @CoryBooker @InSpiteOfTrump @Wokeosaurus_Rex @pugnaciousjew President Obama also appeared at multiple forums to discuss the #ACA and answer questions from Americans. Trump would never do that, because he cannot answer those questions. He has no idea what’s in the #GOPTaxScam, only that it benefits him and his buddies.
@BarbFalk @RepBonnie Thank you for your activism and engagement.
@jimgh141 We continue the fight. The House and Senate will have to vote again after conference.
@MoSilkyMo Wrong, I voted to expand the child tax credit last night. Just not the anemic one put up by Rubio that excluded legal immigrants who pay taxes.
Thank you, so am I. https://twitter.com/free_frias/status/936931968020828160 QT @free_frias @SenBooker @CoryBooker Glad you are my Senator

No I didn’t (I wasn’t in Congress then). No I won’t, I was elected to speak on behalf of my state and finally... I sincerely wish you well. https://twitter.com/gingerliy1/status/936936937037934594 QT @gingerliy1 @CoryBooker Did you read the ObamaCare bill?  Then shut up.

Scott, I wasn’t in Congress when the ACA passed. And even when it did there were days for analysis of that bill, plus, dozens of open hearings AND over 100 republican amendments added. This process was a sham and shame. No transparency or public input. https://twitter.com/scott330snyder/status/936939149684281345 QT @scott330snyder @SenBooker @CoryBooker Why are you mad? None of you read ACA. Rand Paul tried to pass a bill to make it mandatory to read bills before vote and ALL of you said no.
@RoyBlunt @SenCapito @BillCassidy @Sen_JoeManchin @clairecmc @SenStabenow @SenatorHeitkamp @SenGaryPeters & special thanks to my colleague from #Florida @BillNelson 4/4
@RoyBlunt @SenCapito @BillCassidy @JohnKennedyLA  @SenMikeLee @JerryMoran @lisamurkowski @SenatorRisch @SenSasse @SenDanSullivan @SenDonnelly @SenAngusKing @amyklobuchar 3/4
@RoyBlunt @SenCapito @BillCassidy @SenatorCollins @TomCottonAR @MikeCrapo @tedcruz  @SenJoniErnst @SenatorFischer @SenCoryGardner @SenDeanHeller @SenJohnHoeven 2/4
Thank you  for voting for the expanded #ChildTaxCredit to the following bi-partisan group of Senators @RoyBlunt @SenCapito @BillCassidy 1/4

This bill will now go to conference and have to be voted on again in the House and Senate. Please let NJ Congress people know you stand against this bill. https://twitter.com/judis217/status/936939498142826497 QT @judis217 @SenBooker @CoryBooker I’m your constituent and thankful you’re representing us. But feeling mighty helpless right now. What can we do other than cheer you and @SenatorMenendez on?

@Wokeosaurus_Rex @pugnaciousjew 1. I wasn’t in Congress when the ACA past. 2. With that bill there were many days for reading, expert analysis & more between its completion and the time the Senate voted. 3. This is NOT how Congress works. And we shouldn’t be silent when something is wrong. 4. All the best to U.
Funny, I wish you were my president. https://twitter.com/seestur/status/936951909897957376 QT @Seestur @CoryBooker I wish you were my president.

Last night was a terrific victory for the American people. This tax bill is a historic tax cut designed to bring back jobs to raise wages and to help the American family: https://www.facebook.com/tedcruzpage/photos/a.495661567463.299907.69983322463/10155782635852464/?type=3 http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DQC9hQoX0AILImd.jpg

“The most common way people give up their power is by thinking they don't have any.”
Alice Walker https://twitter.com/winbaldy/status/936970839563603969 QT @Winbaldy @CoryBooker I'm sorry Senator but I respectfully disagree. The average American has no say in the decision making process. It is the donor class making the decisions.

I’m glad civil rights activists didn’t take your position or I wouldn’t be here. From the labor movement to the suffrage movement, folks who understood that, the power of the people is greater than the people in power, are the ones who make change despite the odds. https://twitter.com/winbaldy/status/936970839563603969 QT @Winbaldy @CoryBooker I'm sorry Senator but I respectfully disagree. The average American has no say in the decision making process. It is the donor class making the decisions.

Thanks for that throw back pearl. https://twitter.com/raveonrichmond/status/936970580569612288 QT @RaveonRichmond @CoryBooker @neeratanden "Let fury have the hour. Anger can be power. D'you know that you can use it." The Clash

I love you and send you and your family encouragement and kindness. Thanks for your critique of my words I will take them to head and not to heart. https://twitter.com/yorgo1960/status/936969590961303552 QT @Yorgo1960 @CoryBooker What 5 year old wrote that pitiful poem?  Man that's awful.

Never, ever give up hope. Hope is the active conviction that despair will not have the last word. . . The active conviction... Hope works, hope sweats, hope never gives up. https://twitter.com/litl1kj/status/936959234213892102 QT @litl1kj @CoryBooker evil never wins right? Good always prevails, I still have hope that our good people will conquer this bad administration. Thank you for fighting for the good!

Sorry Chris, when I haven’t slept I sometimes slip into freestyle poetry. Look, all positive change in the US came from the average citizen. Change doesn’t come from Washington, it comes to Washington. We all need to fight. It is the obligation and blessing of citizenship. https://twitter.com/chrisrapoff/status/936959271870148609 QT @ChrisRapoff @CoryBooker Senator, we admire your fight but we (average US citizens) HAVE NO SAY in this fight.  Look at the numbers...  a vast majority don't want this, yet Congress passes it anyway.   We just want to live our lives.  Must every day be a fight for decency?

We didn’t invite the fight 
And
It ain’t right
But we all must fight 
Around the clock, day and night. 
For those that don’t have the might
Through anger, frustration, & fright
For our ancestors who set this dream alight 
Until we end injustice and hatred’s blight
WE MUST FIGHT. https://twitter.com/chrisrapoff/status/936959271870148609 QT @ChrisRapoff @CoryBooker Senator, we admire your fight but we (average US citizens) HAVE NO SAY in this fight.  Look at the numbers...  a vast majority don't want this, yet Congress passes it anyway.   We just want to live our lives.  Must every day be a fight for decency?

Most people who enroll in a health care plan on http://healthcare.gov can find plans for $50 to $100 per month. Free, professional assistance is also available: 1-800-318-2596 and online.

The deadline is less than 2 weeks away on December 15 so please don't wait! http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DQDGsjtXUAA-qkT.jpg

I mean the classic filibuster where you stand and deliver? Or is that moot with reconciliation?
I must and I will. We must all. https://twitter.com/librarydancer/status/936959565048041475 QT @librarydancer @CoryBooker You must fight harder, Senator Booker.
Yes. Please. https://twitter.com/soupycloth/status/936959816651722752 QT @Soupycloth @ahayesbelmont @CoryBooker New Jersey has a bunch of Republican Reps who may vote no on this bill. Call 'em.
@julie_nicholasi I don’t know where you live exactly. But there are NJ Congress people we need to press to vote against this.

No it wasn’t. The ACA went through dozens and dozens of open hearings, the President went on live TV and debated republicans defending it, the process allowed Republicans to amend the bill over 100 times and it was open to public scrutiny, all before passing. https://twitter.com/s_r_c__/status/936960008658587648 QT @S_R_C__ @dvorakoelling @CoryBooker were you this upset when aca was passed? it was the same way.
